name: Your Room
description: Your small private room above the courier office. A bed, desk, and everything you need.
initialState: Unmade bed, papers scattered on desk. The morning's letters await your attention.

name: Office Desk
description: A worn wooden desk in the main courier office. Where the real work happens.
initialState: Letters sorted into piles. Sealing wax and quill at the ready. Official courier business.

name: Window View
description: A window overlooking the market square. Perfect for observing the day's activities.
initialState: Morning light streams through. The sounds of the waking market drift up from below.

name: Main Hall
description: The heart of the tavern. Tables and chairs around the great copper kettle hearth.
initialState: Warm firelight flickers. The copper kettle hangs over glowing embers. Conversations drift from various tables.

name: Bar Counter
description: The polished wooden bar where Bertram serves drinks and meals to travelers.
initialState: Bertram polishes glasses behind the counter. Bottles and mugs line the shelves.

name: Corner Table
description: A quiet table in the corner, perfect for private conversations and intimate gatherings.
initialState: A small wooden table with two chairs. Dimly lit and away from the main crowd.

name: Upstairs Room
description: A small rented room above the tavern. Simple but clean accommodations for travelers.
initialState: A narrow bed with clean sheets. A washbasin and small table complete the modest furnishings.

name: Central Fountain
description: The ornate fountain at the heart of Market Square. A gathering place for all.
initialState: Clear water sparkles in the light. Citizens gather on benches around the fountain's edge.

name: Merchant Row
description: A row of merchant stalls with goods from across the region.
initialState: Neat rows of merchandise. Marcus arranges his wares with practiced efficiency.

name: North Alcove
description: A shaded alcove near the north entrance, perfect for discrete conversations.
initialState: A quiet corner away from the main square bustle. Stone benches offer rest.

name: North Entrance
description: The guarded entrance to the north road. Papers are checked here.
initialState: Guards in uniform stand watch. Travelers queue to have their documents inspected.

name: Guard Post
description: The official guard post near the north entrance. Guards monitor traffic here.
initialState: Guards in uniform stand watch. Papers are checked methodically.

name: Lord Aldwin's Manor
description: An imposing manor house with high walls and formal gardens.
initialState: Pristine gardens and marble steps leading to an ornate door. Guards patrol the perimeter.

name: Lord Blackwood's Estate
description: A grand estate known for hosting influential gatherings and political dealings.
initialState: Impressive architecture with tall windows. The sound of a fountain echoes from within.

name: Various Shops
description: A row of shops selling everything from spices to leather goods.
initialState: Busy shopkeepers calling out their wares. The smell of various goods mingles in the air.

name: Willow Bend
description: A peaceful bend in the river path, shaded by ancient willow trees.
initialState: Dappled sunlight filters through hanging willow branches. The river flows quietly nearby.

name: River Crossing
description: A shallow ford where the path crosses the river. Stepping stones mark the way.
initialState: Clear water flows over smooth stones. The crossing looks manageable on foot.

name: Path Junction
description: Where the riverside path splits toward different destinations.
initialState: Wooden signs point in different directions. Well-worn paths diverge from this point.

name: Gate Entrance
description: The main entrance to the city. Guards check papers while travelers come and go.
initialState: Guards in uniform stand at attention. A steady stream of people pass through the gates.

name: Traveler's Rest
description: A small area near the gates where travelers prepare for journeys or rest after arrival.
initialState: Travelers checking supplies. Horses being watered. The bustle of preparation.

name: Main Desk
description: The harbor master's working desk where all river transport business is conducted.
initialState: Charts and schedules cover the desk surface. Captain Thorne reviews manifests and coordinates river traffic.

name: Waiting Area
description: Simple benches where visitors wait to conduct business with the harbor master.
initialState: Wooden benches line the wall. A few travelers sit patiently, documents in hand.

name: Charts Room
description: A back room filled with river maps, shipping schedules, and navigation charts.
initialState: Detailed maps cover every wall. Navigation instruments and route schedules fill the shelves.

name: Dock View Window
description: A large window overlooking the river docks and boat traffic.
initialState: Through the window, boats bob at their moorings. River traffic flows past in both directions.

name: Ferry Dock
description: A wooden dock where the city ferry operates, connecting to routes across the water.
initialState: The ferry bobs at the dock. Passengers wait with their belongings while the ferryman prepares.
